title: Redact a Document for FOIA Release
description: A public records officer is preparing a document for release under FOIA and needs to redact exempt information.

tasks.description: Review the document to identify information that is exempt from disclosure (e.g., personal private information, deliberative process).
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer identifies several pieces of personally identifiable information (PII) in the document.

tasks.description: Use a redaction tool to black out the exempt information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer successfully redacts all PII.

tasks.description: Save the redacted version of the document, ready for release to the requestor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer prepares the final, redacted document for delivery.
